list.description:
#m36_jackson

M36 Sight
Zoom :5.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m36

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m36

#type58 #t34_85zis53

T-34-85 Sight
Zoom :4.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_58

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_type_58

WTDraw – web editor for sight artwork.
Application's functionality is a subject to change or expand in the future.
Link: https://solawk.github.io/wtdraw
Short link: https://bit.ly/wt-draw
Video (in russian): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EsAzBBX3aqY
Universal standard sight is included in the archive.
For other users' convenience, it is advised to attach the artwork's .json-file saved from the editor to the sight's file.

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

COMBO Rocket and gun sight pack for (almost) all P51 models in the game. P51's that have HVAR or M8 rockets have sights aligned for them. (Israel P51 has sights for rockets, but I was unable to test them).
TO USE HVARS Ensure that IAS is greater than 500kmh OR you are at ...

How to use it?:
1. Just place the UserSights folder in the game root directory. It won't overwrite anything.
2. The default is that all ground vehicles can use it. Please ...

I have managed to make Doll from the youtube show Murder Drones made by Glitch Productions into a war thunder sight.

Now she will always watch as you mercilessly decimate other players, don't mind the laughter or the weird red code sometimes eminating from this war thunder sight. Enjoy!

#alltanks #sight #murder_drones

It's a sight for the BT-42 for simulator battles. This is the first sight I've made so it's quite simple. Both the HEAT and HE shell work quite fine on it because they have similar velocities. I made the distances as accurate as I could. I also made the lines thin and numbers quite small because I like it more.

#bt42 #bt_42

Another T-62 Sight | KMS Blücher (Azur Lane)

Sorry for the bad quality on this one, probably works on other tanks too.. I don't know.

#t62 #azurlane #blucher #anime

SIMPLIFIED SWEDEN RANK VII SIGHTS
Tested on 1080p only

Current vehicles present in this pack:

  • Strv 121/Leo 2A4
  • Strf 9040C
  • Strf 9040 BILL
  • CV90105
  • CT-CV 105HP
  • Lvkv 9040C
  • ASRAD-R

Sights are based off of found demonstration footage and real life pics.

Source: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit

#sweden #sight

Leclerc Series custom sight

To change the color of sight use your "Crosshair lighting" keybind.

Installation: Unzip/extract the file and paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights.

For any troubles, suggestions or sight requests you can find me in this discord server: RUzarfS4ua

Check up my profile for other custom sights for different vehicles and nations.

#france #fr #leclerc #leclercs1 #leclercs2 #leclercazur #leclercsxxi #tank #sight #customsight #custom

当前版本：2.33.0.135这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.33.0.135 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.c...

A modern design for a universal sight. Features Range notches, it's a first version, currently working of further improvements for sight calibration in order to use lines for rangefinding without rangefinder. #alltanks #modern
